summary: This is a Bureau of Prisons inmate history record for Jeffrey Epstein, detailing his cell assignments and movements within the Metropolitan Correctional Center (MCC) in New York from July 6, 2019, to August 10, 2019. The document shows his housing locations and bed assignments during the period leading up to his death.

persons.name: Jeffrey Edward Epstein
persons.context: The subject of the inmate history record, showing his housing assignments within the Metropolitan Correctional Center, New York.

events.title: Epstein's initial incarceration housing
events.description: Jeffrey Epstein begins his incarceration at the Metropolitan Correctional Center, New York, assigned to House R, Range 01, Bed 001L.

events.title: Final housing assignment before death
events.description: Epstein's last recorded housing assignment was in House Z, Range 04, Bed 206L AD, ending at 07:36 on August 10, 2019.

keyFacts: The document is an official Bureau of Prisons inmate history record for Jeffrey Epstein.
It details Epstein's cell assignments and movements within the Metropolitan Correctional Center from July 6, 2019, to August 10, 2019.
Epstein was moved between multiple housing units (Houses R, E, Z, and H) and specific beds during this period.
His final recorded assignment was in House Z, Range 04, Bed 206L AD, ending at 07:36 on August 10, 2019.
The record was generated on September 19, 2022, as part of a data query regarding his incarceration history.
